text: Israel competed at the 1964 Summer Olympics in Tokyo, Japan.Israel at the 1960 Roma Summer Games ==Results by event== ===Athletics=== Gideon Ariel Miriam Siderenski running with her daughter {| class="wikitable" style="font-size: 95%;" |- !Event !Participant !Result !Ref |- |Men's Discus Throw |Gideon Ariel |26th | |- |Men's 800 metres |Amos Gilad |DNF; Achilles tendon rupture | |- |Women's High Jump |Michal Lamdani |19th (tied) | |- | *Women's 100 metres *Women's 200 metres |Miriam Siderenski | *6th in Heat 3 *4th in Heat 4 | |- |Men's 100 metres |Levi Psavkin |7th in Heat 5 | |- |} ===Shooting=== Three shooters represented Israel in 1964. {| class="wikitable" style="font-size: 95%;" |- !Event !Participant !Result !Ref |- |Men's trap |Maksim Kahan |47th | |- |Men's 50 metre rifle, prone |Nehemia Sirkis |47th | |- | *Men's Small-Bore Rifle, Three Positions, 50 metres *Men's 50 metre rifle, prone |Hannan Crystal | *36th *63rd | |- |} ===Swimming=== {| class="wikitable" style="font-size: 95%;" |- !Event !Participant !Result !Ref |- |Men's 200 metre Butterfly |Avraham Melamed |5th in Heat 2 | |- | *Men's 200 metre Breaststroke *Men's 400 metre Individual Medley |Gershon Shefa | *5th in Heat 4 *7th in Heat 1 | |- |} ==References== Category:Nations at the 1964 Summer Olympics 1964 Summer Olympics Summer Olympics
title: Israel at the 1964 Summer Olympics
